  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (0,0) size 800x600

          LayoutBlockFlow {UL} at (0,0) size 800x0
            LayoutBlockFlow (floating) {LI} at (0,0) size 455x24 [border: (2px solid #0000FF)]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 451x19
                text run at (2,2) width 451: "There should be a gap between this float and the green rectangle above."

        LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (2,34) size 796x0
        LayoutBlockFlow (anonymous) at (2,34) size 796x20
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 483x19
